product.longDescription:
Skip checking a bag, carry on with style and ease. Expansion, a USB charging port and a patent pending Wireless Charging pocket create the ideal marriage of smart tech and sleek form in our Expandable 19” Spinner.
Product Features
• Nylon Twill fabric with vinyl trim and water resistant coating
• Front zippered pocket: perfect for storing smaller items needing quick and easy access; includes an integrated USB Port that provides easy connection to USB accessories (battery/USB accessories not included)
• Wireless Charging Pocket: located in the middle exterior pocket, this patent pending feature is designed to fit your wireless battery and phone for effortless charging on the go (wireless battery not included)
• Expansion: .5", designated by a unique zipper pull; offers additional packing capacity
• Fully Featured Interior: includes two side storage pockets, Smart Fix Buckles™ and removable 3-1-1 friendly pouch
• Smart Fix Buckles™: Smart design keeps compression straps out of the way while packing, then easily clasps to securely essentials
• Removable 3-1-1 Friendly Pouch: transparent, spill-friendly and just the right size to make getting through the airport that much easier
• Dual Spinner Wheels
• Retractable ID Tag: discreetly located on the back of the bag; protects private information needed for bag identification or retrieval
• Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Go to shop.samsonite.com/airline-carry-on-guide for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines.
• Weight: 6.5 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 19.0" x 14.0" x 10.0"
Overall Dimensions: 22.0" x 14.0" x 10.0"
